edge_1: Frank Costello introduces himself to a young Colin Sullivan.
edge_2: Colin Sullivan joins the Special Investigation Unit (SIU).

edge_1: one night, costigan follows costello into an adult theater and witnesses him giving sullivan an envelope containing information of his crew.
